about_the_game:
Doozie the Unicorn, a Gothic, Dark Fantasy, Medieval, Action, Adventure, fairy-tale.

Dive into the Medieval Gothic world of Doozie the Unicorn. Explore Dungeons, Infernos, Enchanted Faerie Lands, Castles, and Celestial Gardens. Battle with Demons and Skeletons, Meet with Faery friends and Dragon friends. Use different swords created by your Faery friends. Rejuvenate with rejuvenation potions, travel on Magic carpets. Fulfill prophecies and destinies.

You are Doozie the Unicorn, destined to take the throne. Dark Demons, want to stop Doozie(you) from reaching the Wisdom Dragons, for your celestial destiny. Your journey begins now.

Chondakay - A tall, slender, Red Demon with sharp claws. Outmaneuver the Chondakay demon, or use a faerie sword to slay the demon.

Treza - A three headed, tall, Demon, Use your faerie sword to slay the demon, or outmaneuver them.

Skely - A skeleton from the past, it's purpose: keep Doozie in the Inferno. Slay the Skely with a faerie sword, or outmaneuver the Skely.

Chuko - A slime demon. Slay the demon with a faerie sword, or outmaneuver the Chuko.

Faery - Long neck beautiful fairies. Friends to help you on your journey. They provide weapons and rejuvenation potions.

Queen Filera - Queen of the feline princess clowder.

Magic Carpets - Carpets to help you across obstacles.

Lotus Flowers - Flowers that give Doozie Growth, Wisdom, Knowledge, and confidence.

Doozie the Unicorn legend begins now.

LOAD GAME BUTTON - to avoid crash, SAVE GAME then LOAD GAME. In other words, before pressing the LOAD GAME button, while playing a level press the SAVE GAME button, then if you wish to load game, you will be able to use the LOAD GAME button.
detailed_description:
Doozie the Unicorn, a Gothic, Dark Fantasy, Medieval, Action, Adventure, fairy-tale.

Dive into the Medieval Gothic world of Doozie the Unicorn. Explore Dungeons, Infernos, Enchanted Faerie Lands, Castles, and Celestial Gardens. Battle with Demons and Skeletons, Meet with Faery friends and Dragon friends. Use different swords created by your Faery friends. Rejuvenate with rejuvenation potions, travel on Magic carpets. Fulfill prophecies and destinies.

You are Doozie the Unicorn, destined to take the throne. Dark Demons, want to stop Doozie(you) from reaching the Wisdom Dragons, for your celestial destiny. Your journey begins now.

Chondakay - A tall, slender, Red Demon with sharp claws. Outmaneuver the Chondakay demon, or use a faerie sword to slay the demon.

Treza - A three headed, tall, Demon, Use your faerie sword to slay the demon, or outmaneuver them.

Skely - A skeleton from the past, it's purpose: keep Doozie in the Inferno. Slay the Skely with a faerie sword, or outmaneuver the Skely.

Chuko - A slime demon. Slay the demon with a faerie sword, or outmaneuver the Chuko.

Faery - Long neck beautiful fairies. Friends to help you on your journey. They provide weapons and rejuvenation potions.

Queen Filera - Queen of the feline princess clowder.

Magic Carpets - Carpets to help you across obstacles.

Lotus Flowers - Flowers that give Doozie Growth, Wisdom, Knowledge, and confidence.

Doozie the Unicorn legend begins now.

LOAD GAME BUTTON - to avoid crash, SAVE GAME then LOAD GAME. In other words, before pressing the LOAD GAME button, while playing a level press the SAVE GAME button, then if you wish to load game, you will be able to use the LOAD GAME button.
